page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO GLENPROSEN
page.content:
Glenprosen is situated in the Region of Scotland called Tayside. It is one of the Angus Glens. The nearest town is Kirriemuir 10 miles away. Our nearest city is Dundee 28 miles away.We are North West of Dundee.
The whole glen is reflected in our Domesday patch.This is mostly rough, heather covered hill with areas of forest and a very small area of arable farmland down along the banks of the Prosen Water.
The height of the land varies from 220 metres at Spott farmhouse to 510 metres at the top of Hill of Couternach.
